testsuite.name: DELETE /me/payment-methods/{id}

testcase.name: should return 400 PAYMENT_METHOD_REMOVE_FAILED when service throws IllegalArgumentException
should return 400 PAYMENT_METHOD_REMOVE_FAILED when auth fails
should remove payment method for authenticated user and return 204
